# this is the build file for project PuzzleSolver
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(PuzzleSolver VERSION 0.0.1 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(PuzzleSolver "")
set_target_properties(PuzzleSolver PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "PuzzleSolver")
set_target_properties(PuzzleSolver PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
target_include_directories(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_definitions(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE
    ROOT
    SRC
)
target_compile_options(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m32>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m32>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET PuzzleSolver PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(PuzzleSolver PRIVATE
    src/main.cc
)

# target
add_executable(Solver-Test "")
set_target_properties(Solver-Test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Solver-Test")
set_target_properties(Solver-Test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
target_include_directories(Solver-Test PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_definitions(Solver-Test PRIVATE
    ROOT
    TEST
)
target_compile_options(Solver-Test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m32>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m32>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(Solver-Test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(Solver-Test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET Solver-Test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(Solver-Test PRIVATE
    test/test.cc
)
